allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add T16O v1 Docker infrastructure setup

- Add docker-compose.v1.yml for container orchestration
- Add t16o_v1_setup.ps1 PowerShell setup script
- Update appsettings to use v1 ports (MySQL 3396, RabbitMQ 5692)

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(for t in tx tx_account tx_activities tx_addresses tx_instruction tx_party tx_pool tx_program tx_sol_balance_change tx_swaps tx_token tx_token_balance_change tx_token_holder tx_token_market tx_token_price tx_tokens tx_transaction_signer tx_transfer tx_transfers)
Bash(do echo '-- $t table' docker exec t16o_v1_mysql mysql -uroot -prootpassword t16o_db -N -e 'SHOW CREATE TABLE $t\G')

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\wgadb\source\repos\T16O" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add shredder-tx-basic.py for account transaction fetching

- New script fetches transactions from Solscan /account/transactions API
- Supports pagination with --before cursor and --max-tx-count limit
- Uses persistent HTTP session for connection pooling
- Extracts program names from parsed_instructions
- Creates tx, tx_signer, tx_program records
- Fix tx_signer table name in sp_tx_clear_tables
- Add tx_state column to tx table

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\wgadb\source\repos\T16O" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Rename tx_hash to signature in tx table and shredders

- Update tx.sql schema column name
- Update shredder-tx-basic.py INSERT and stats
- Update shredder.py INSERT and stats

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\wgadb\source\repos\T16O" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add shredder-tx-decoded-detail.py for enriching transactions

- Fetches decoded and detail data from Solscan multi APIs
- Combines responses into single JSON files
- State machine: primed -> processing -> ready
- Reverts to primed on error for retry
- Saves to files/tx/drop/episode_tx__{uuid}.ready
- Add documentation with workflow diagram

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\wgadb\source\repos\T16O" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add async parallel API calls, RabbitMQ, and bulk inserts

shredder-tx-decoded-detail.py:
- Convert to async with aiohttp for parallel API calls
- Add RabbitMQ publish for enriched data
- Fallback to file output when RabbitMQ unavailable

shredder-consumer.py (new):
- RabbitMQ consumer for tx.enriched queue
- Bulk inserts using executemany() for all child tables
- Updates tx_state to ''shredded'' after processing

Documentation:
- Update architecture diagram showing full pipeline
- Add dependency list (aiohttp, pika)

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
